about_the_game:
Idle Trillionaire is a game about becoming a trillionaire. You are a seemingly normal person, but how will that break your fragile human mind when you are earning billions each second and realize madness is closer than your dreams of a trillion?

Now in 11 Languages!

Compete to have more money than other players at the 1 year mark and other milestones!

Leverage the prestige system that unlocks cards and increases the time rate on subsequent play throughs.

Are you ready to dive into the ultimate gaming experience that will redefine your understanding of prosperity? Look no further than Idle Trillionaire.

🌟 **Build Your Empire:** Begin your ascent to unimaginable "wealth" (greed) by strategically acquiring and upgrading resource-boosting cards. With each card purchase, watch as your earnings of both money and happiness skyrocket, setting the stage for an exponential cascade of riches.

💰 **Unleash Your Potential:** As your "wealth" (greed) accumulates, explore an ever-expanding arsenal of cards that supercharge your earnings even further. Witness as your financial prowess reaches the levels of the world's "wealthiest" (greediest) elites, generating millions of dollars per hour effortlessly.

😄 **Collect Happy:** Happiness isn't just a feeling; it's a valuable resource! Accumulate happy points to unlock new dimensions of growth, making each gaming session a joyous and fulfilling experience.

🌍 **Beyond Trillions:** While $1 trillion might seem like an astronomical sum, your ambitions don't have to stop there. Idle Trillionaire dares you to dream bigger – purchase entire countries, continents, and even the entire globe as you solidify your dominance on an unprecedented scale.

Reach the achievement goals faster than your friends!

Are you ready to embark on a wealth-building adventure that transcends boundaries and defies expectations? Join the ranks of the idle trillionaires and experience the ultimate evolution of idle gaming.

content_descriptors.notes:
Idle Trillionaire contains mature content that may not be suitable for all audiences. We want to provide you with information to make an informed decision before playing. The game includes:

Depictions of Substance Abuse:
Some cards reference drug use and addiction.

Sexual Content:
Certain cards include content related to consensual sexual acts.

If you have concerns or if these themes may be distressing for you, we recommend considering your comfort level before playing.

Thank you for your understanding, and we hope you enjoy Idle Trillionaire responsibly.

Sincerely,
The Slanted Room
